post.body: all this ACTUP/Philly talk is stirring up major nostalgia! Wish I could have been there to see you, Zoe, Albo and Matty.
are you in PDX? I think I spotted Chris Wetherell of Dealership, Citizens from Here and Abroad and GMail engineer fame.
congratu-freaking-lations!
I will do all I can to go to Blokeback Mountain. I DON'T wish I knew how to quit you, MSKR!
sent you a flickr mail... go read it, lady! kiss, kiss.
Nice work. Congrats!
hooray for the patch. So happy to have you up and running.
posted the core conversation I'll be leading: Commu(k)nity: what marketers can learn from online crafting. See you in Austin!
I may be able to spit something out for you. WAV or mp3?
no, just an iPhone. I didn't access web on it at the office.
do you want me to come in and cover a shift?
Sounds like you got some great music... if I'm responsible for getting those onto your iPod, I am proud of my influence
Me too! IOU an email. Happy New Year, doll.
love nerdaste!
Dear Twitter and blog, Sorry I've been ignoring you lately. The return to work gas been eating my brain and I haven't been online for fun.
New sweater still needs closures (hook & eye?). Like, don't love. Sleeves too long and tight. My gauge error, pattern is fabu!
Just had my first Burger King cheesy tot here in Weed, CA. Nice mouth feel and tooth. Unexpected tang balancing the fried goodness.
Knitting and seaming completed on Daniel from TwistCollective.com. All that remains is weaving in the ends.
Hitting the road back to Eugene. Thanks, PDX, for a productive and Stumptown-filled day!
Enjoyed/disgusted by bubble gum doughnut I just ate at Voodoo in PDX.
Lattes and everything bagel at Wandering Goat.
Bedtime, after an hour of work. Still unknown: Will I be meeting an iPhone App developer in Portland tomorrow?
Happy Tofurkey Day, friends!
9.5 hours to get here and homemade mac and cheese is waiting for me? So thankful!
hitting the road for Eugene in the next hour!
Looks like I'll never be manorexic. I like cheese and the occasional beer too much.
20 rows to complete the knitting on Daniel, then side seams and arm holes. New sweater for Turkey Day!
How is it that this week's Sarah Silverman and South Park both had more interesting knit and crochet content than Knitting Daily on PBS?
Alive and well post swim practice. Now what?
Rewarded Janie for a great vet visit with romp time at the Castro off-leash dog park. PS I think most of the dogs there are gay.
believe it or not, from my culinary retrosexual, meat-and-potatoes, caveman-like husband: we should try to eat more tofu
Can't remember the last time I came home after 1am. I'm old. Http://www.voniva.com show was amazing as to be expected.
Von Iva encore at Cafe du Nord.
TwitterFon, why are you crashing? From neglect?
ran 3.4187 miles this morning with six 90 sec intervals, just for added punishment.
At SF Bike Coalition Winterfest
My SXSWi idea was rejected for a panel, but invited to be a Core Conversation: Commu(k)nity: Lessons for Marketers From Online Crafting
Enjoyed chips and queso at Velvet Cantina where 17FEET was having their holiday party.
Third time's a charm! Bound off a m√∂bius cowl. Best one yet (of 4 others)!
home from the company party; so glad I work for that place with such great people.
Picking up German food after recording the Men's Fall Knitting Retreat episode of YKNIT.
all-day company meeting all done!
Livid re: sofa arrived with boxcutter wound in cushion, found after delivery guys left. Waiting for Ikea to call back and un-ruin Xmas.
Dear Twitter-ati, what supplies would you recommend to someone interested in exploring ink and watercolor sketchbook-ery?
Had I known there would be no class tonight, I could have been trimming the tree chez @WonderMike!
Turns out I'm wearing this dancebelt for no reason. Circus class cancelled tonight for tech rehearsal for tomorrow's student show.
Last circus class of the year tonight.
Best Xmas present ever arrived in my inbox this morn. More later (in 2009)!
TiVo, please record more interesting things. I hate programming you.
phone now has wireless access in the office, so I can be more productive when I'm not strapped to my desk for 10 hours!
Finished Mermaid/Pomotomous glove on aran yarn, US 6's & 36 sts around. Need recipient to try it on before weaving in ends from 5 fingers.
New circus rope at work? It's well hung. Now all I need is some rosin.
Off to pick up some circus rope!
another late night, but this one saw the weaving in of ends on White Elephant gift for work.
up past midnight... so I thought I'd check on BMFA's 2009 sock club sign ups. SPOILER: it's not up. I'm going to bed.
Soaking my feets. Very habit-forming. Gateway activity to baths?
after a bath, everything feels better. I should bathe more often...
Lying in bed nursing a sore throat, tea brewing. Too old to stay up past 1am, but seeing Loquat in Oakland worth it. Delicious 90's sound.
just did a clean sweep of bloglines... ready to read more frequently
Run done.
New Year's resolutions in effect: only one beer tonight, even though I finished mine before food was ordered.
Thank you, KALX for playing "Take the Skinheads Bowling" by CvB
First day back at work, mildly productive. More importantly, Walzwerk re-opens after holiday! Beer, cheese and sp√§zle, please.
Bean soup is simmering. I'll have a bite (with black-eyed peas, of course) before bed. Hope this is the best 2009 ever!
got a New Year's Day run in... 3.4 miles. If I run once a month, that would be more than I ran in 2008.
just typed in a mess of 2009 resolutions into the phone... I'm not usually a resolved kind of guy. But that was so last year...
2009's delicious start! http://twitpic.com/yq3z
NYE cooking: bread is done, and so am I. Thanks for sharing this evening with me!
Happy New Year's from the Left Coast!
NYE cooking: bread is baking. 2009 is going to smell delicious!
NYE cooking: tomorrow's bread is in loaf pan proofing for an hour
NYE: homemade limoncello is delicious! but 80 days of prep? that's dedication!
NYE: back to neighbor's for homemade limoncello.
